rows.label: qev087007_MSG0001
rows.name: Wonderful. I'll expect a report from the Ma-non, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0002
rows.name:
It seems I was correct—
your team was the right one for the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0003
rows.name: I hope you'll continue to assist in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0004
rows.name: Of course...as long as our goals align.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0005
rows.name:
Our mutual objective is the continued survival
of the human race. This will not change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0006
rows.name: Indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0007
rows.name:
"The continued survival of the human race."
Everything's a speech with that guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0008
rows.name: No, that's one thing he's truly serious about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0009
rows.name: You know, I heard something the other day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0010
rows.name: Did you know about his son? The soldier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0011
rows.name: No, is he a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0012
rows.name:
He never left Earth...
Apparently because of the director general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0013
rows.name:
He sent his son on a mission just before
the White Whale took off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_JNK0010
rows.name: Gasp

rows.label: qev087007_SEL0011
rows.name: Express shock at his callous action.

rows.label: qev087007_JNK0020
rows.name: Consider

rows.label: qev087007_SEL0021
rows.name: Wonder aloud why he would do something like that.

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0014
rows.name: Yes, yes! How can stuffy suit call himself a dadapon?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0015
rows.name: Right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0016
rows.name: It's not fair to judge someone based on hearsay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0017
rows.name: But Elma—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0018
rows.name:
Perhaps he's the sort of person who refuses
to give his family special treatment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0019
rows.name:
Regardless, if there's one thing I'm sure of,
it's that he's acting on what he feels to be right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0020
rows.name:
It may seem cold at times,
but you should at least give the man his due.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0021
rows.name: Yeah, I guess so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0022
rows.name:
If he were a corrupt man, he would've
sent someone else's son on that mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0023
rows.name: Hmm... But he didn't, did he...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087007_MSG0024
rows.name:
I guess sometimes the right thing to do
is also the hard thing, huh?[ST:wait ]
